channel.title: Reserach on Irene Tan
channel.description: Recent content in Reserach on Irene Tan

item.title: What's the best way to build an efficient research workflow?
item.description: As the title indicated, I personally haven’t find THE best way to do so. There is still a long way to go. But influenced by many people, I thing Github + Dropbox/Cluster works perfect, at least for now. Github serves as a code hub where you can do version control and collaborate with co-authors. Dropbox or a computer cluster serves as cloud to store all the huge data.
